parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Implement changes to the current system baseline and deploy the updated baseline across the installed base using {{ cm-3.3_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Automated tools can improve the accuracy, consistency, and availability of configuration baseline information. Automation can also provide data aggregation and data correlation capabilities, alerting mechanisms, and dashboards to support risk-based decision-making within the organization.
